ygData.subject: Re: Sonorous Clouding message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh. That s funny. The programmers couldn t figure out how to get that damn invisibility icon to blink so they put in a text warning. Too typical. --
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Aug 31/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Other camos and 'specialty' spells (e.g. invis to unded) are giving text
> warnings instead of blinking icons. And thus the Gawds looked down from the
> High Planes and bespoke:
>
> "when a blinking icon is not a blinking icon there cometh a text message
> that is a text message and behold --> YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!"
>
> Makes about as much sense as I can make out of it...
>
> Sylly - the bard!

Heh. That's funny. The programmers couldn't figure out how to get that
damn invisibility icon to blink so they put in a text warning. Too
typical.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
